snippet: A 4-year-old girl accidentally shot her 4-year-old cousin to death with a loaded rifle that she found under a bed at their grandfather’s Detroit home, the police said Friday.
abstract: Four-year-old girl accidentally shoots her four-year-old cousin to death with a loaded rifle that she found under a bed at their grandfather’s Detroit home; police say one adult was home at time and children were playing.
lead_paragraph: A 4-year-old girl accidentally shot her 4-year-old cousin to death with a loaded rifle that she found under a bed at their grandfather’s Detroit home, the police said Friday.

headline.main: Michigan: Boy, 4, Is Killed by Girl, 4, Who Found a Gun
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Boy, 4, Is Killed by Girl, 4, Who Found a Gun
